(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (JJ Last))
    (VP (VBZ Sunday))
    (, ,)))

root(ROOT-0, Sunday-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (DT an) (NN article))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Sunday) (NNP Times))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S
                (VP (VBD talked)
                  (PP (IN about)
                    (NP (DT an) (JJ unmeltable) (NN ice) (NN cream)))
                  (PP (IN from)
                    (NP (NNP Ya) (NNP Kun))))))))))
    (. .)))


expl(was-2, there-1)
root(ROOT-0, was-2)
det(article-4, an-3)
nsubj(was-2, article-4)
prep(article-4, in-5)
nn(Times-7, Sunday-6)
pobj(in-5, Times-7)
nsubj(talked-9, which-8)
rcmod(Times-7, talked-9)
prep(talked-9, about-10)
det(cream-14, an-11)
amod(cream-14, unmeltable-12)
nn(cream-14, ice-13)
pobj(about-10, cream-14)
prep(talked-9, from-15)
nn(Kun-17, Ya-16)
pobj(from-15, Kun-17)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT the) (NN ice) (NN cream))
    (VP (VBZ retains)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBP shape)
            (SBAR (IN for)
              (S
                (NP
                  (NP (DT an) (NN hour))
                  (PP (RB instead) (IN of)
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG melting)
                        (PP (IN into)
                          (NP (DT a)
                            (ADJP (JJ liquid)
                              (PP (IN like)
                                (ADJP (JJS most))))
                            (NN ice) (NN cream)))))))
                (VP (MD should))))))))
    (. .)))

prep(hour-9, of-11)

prep(melting-12, into-13)

amod(cream-19, liquid-15)
prep(liquid-15, like-16)
pobj(like-16, most-17)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBN explained)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (DT this))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (SBAR (IN because)
                (S
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS manufacturers))
                  (VP (VBD added)
                    (NP (NNS emulsifiers)
                      (CC and)
                      (NNS stabilisers))
                    (PP (TO to)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN ice) (NN cream)))
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB prevent)
                          (NP (PRP it))
                          (PP (IN from)
                            (NP (NN melting))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN amount))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (NNS stabilisers))
          (VP (VBN used)))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP
          (NP (NN compliance))
          (PP (IN with)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP US) (NNP FDA) (NNS requirements)))))
      (SBAR (IN so)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADJP (JJ safe)
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (JJ human) (NN consumption))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S

      (SBAR (IN that)

              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WP who))
                (S

  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NNS people) (NN selling) (NN food))
      (VP (MD must)
        (VP (VB be)
          (VP (VBN made)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB feel)
                  (ADJP (JJ responsible))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP

                      (SBAR
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP they))

      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADVP (RB up)
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP (PRP us))))

          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB make)
              (ADJP (JJ sure)
                (SBAR

                    (VP (VBP know)

                        (S

    (. .)))
